it.polimi.deib.newdem.adrenaline.controller.effects

Interface EffectContext

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AtomEffectContext
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AtomContext, MockAtomEffectContext, PowerUpAtom, ReloadAtom, RevengeAtom, ShootAtom, TestChainsawEffect.ChainsawContext, TestChainsawEffect.ChainsawContextNoPayment, TestCyberbladeEffect.CyberbladeContext, TestCyberbladeEffect.CyberbladeContextNoPayment, TestElectroscytheEffect.ElectronScytheContext, TestElectroscytheEffect.ElectronScytheContextNoPayment, TestFlamethrowerEffect.FlamethrowerContext, TestFlamethrowerEffect.FlamethrowerContextNoPayment, TestFurnaceEffect.FurnaceContext, TestGrenadeLauncherEffect.GrenadeLauncherContext, TestGrenadeLauncherEffect.GrenadeLauncherContextNoPayment, TestHeatseekerEffect.HeatseekerContext, TestHellionEffect.HellionContext, TestHellionEffect.HellionContextNoPayment, TestLaserMagnumEffect.LaserMagnumContext, TestLaserMagnumEffect.LaserMagnumContextNoPayment, TestLockRifleEffect.LockRifleContext, TestLockRifleEffect.LockRifleContextNoPayment, TestMachineGunEffect.MachineGunContext, TestMachineGunEffect.MachineGunContextNoPayment, TestNewtonEffect.NewtonContext, TestPlasmaGunEffect.PlasmaGunContext, TestPlasmaGunEffect.PlasmaGunContextNoPayment, TestPowerGloveEffect.PowerGloveContext, TestPowerGloveEffect.PowerGloveContextNoPayment, TestRailgunEffect.RailgunContext, TestRocketLauncherEffect.RocketLauncherContext, TestRocketLauncherEffect.RocketLauncherContextNoPayment, TestShockwaveEffect.ShockwaveContext, TestShockwaveEffect.ShockwaveContextNoPayment, TestShotgunEffect.ShotgunContext, TestSledgehammerEffect.SledgehammerContext, TestSledgehammerEffect.SledgehammerContextNoPayment, TestTagbackGrenadeEffect.TagbackContext, TestTargetingScopeEffect.TargetingScopeContext, TestTeleportEffect.TeleportContext, TestTHOREffect.THORContext, TestTHOREffect.THORContextNoPayment, TestTractorBeamEffect.TractorBeamContext, TestTractorBeamEffect.TractorBeamContextNoPayment, TestVortexCannonEffect.VortexCannonContext, TestVortexCannonEffect.VortexCannonContextNoPayment, TestWhisperEffect.WhisperContext, TestZX2Effect.ZX2Context

    public interface EffectContext
    An object that represents a context where an effect can run. This provides to an EffectManager all the methods that can be used to ask the actor for various choices that are requested by the enclosing effect object. It also provides the game context needed to apply and revert game changes reported by the EffectManager.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Applies the given game change according to this context.
      java.lang.Integer chooseFragment(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> choices)

      Player choosePlayer(MetaPlayer player, PlayerSelector selector, boolean forceChoice)
      Asks the user associated with the actor to choose a player that responds to the given selector.
      Tile chooseTile(TileSelector selector, boolean forceChoice)
      Asks the user associated with the actor to choose a tile.
      void damageDealtTrigger(Player attacker, Player victim)
      Notifies a damage dealt trigger to the context.
      void damageTakenTrigger(Player attacker, Player victim)
      Notifies a damage taken trigger to the context.
      Player getActor()
      Returns the player that is playing in this context.
      Player getAttacker()
      Returns the player that triggered this context, or null if this context is not damage-taken triggered.
      Player getVictim()
      Returns the player that triggered this context, or null if this context is not damage-dealt triggered.
      void revertGameChange(GameChange gameChange)
      Reverts the given game change according to this context.

    • Method Detail

      • applyGameChange

        void applyGameChange(GameChange gameChange)
        Applies the given game change according to this context.

      • revertGameChange

        void revertGameChange(GameChange gameChange)
        Reverts the given game change according to this context. this methods MUST completely neutralize all the changes made by the corresponding call to applyGameChange()

      • getActor

        Player getActor()
        Returns the player that is playing in this context.

      • getAttacker

        Player getAttacker()
        Returns the player that triggered this context, or null if this context is not damage-taken triggered.

      • getVictim

        Player getVictim()
        Returns the player that triggered this context, or null if this context is not damage-dealt triggered.

      • choosePlayer

        Player choosePlayer(MetaPlayer player,
                    PlayerSelector selector,
                    boolean forceChoice)
             throws UndoException
        Asks the user associated with the actor to choose a player that responds to the given selector.
        Parameters:
        player - A MetaPlayer object as mentioned in the card.
        selector - A PlayerSelector predicate that filters the selectable players.
        forceChoice - Whether the choice is mandatory or not.
        Returns:
        The player chosen by the user.
        Throws:
        UndoException - if the user requested to undo the last action.

      • chooseTile

        Tile chooseTile(TileSelector selector,
                boolean forceChoice)
         throws UndoException
        Asks the user associated with the actor to choose a tile.
        Parameters:
        selector - A TileSelector predicate that filters the selectable tiles.
        forceChoice - Whether the choice is mandatory or not.
        Returns:
        The tile chosen by the user.
        Throws:
        UndoException - if the user requested to undo the last action.

      • chooseFragment

        java.lang.Integer chooseFragment(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> choices)
                          throws UndoException
        Asks the user associated with the actor to choose a fragment.
        Parameters:
        choices - The IDs of the selectable fragments.
        Returns:
        The fragment chosen by the user.
        Throws:
        UndoException - if the user requested to undo the last action.

      • choosePayment

        PaymentReceipt choosePayment(PaymentInvoice price,
                             int choice)
                      throws UndoException
        Requests the user associated with the actor to pay for a given choice.
        Parameters:
        price - The price of the effect.
        choice - The ID of the effect the payment is for.
        Returns:
        A PaymentReceipt object containing the user's choice about the equip used to pay, or null if the payment was rejected.
        Throws:
        UndoException - if the user requested to undo the last action.

      • damageDealtTrigger

        void damageDealtTrigger(Player attacker,
                        Player victim)
        Notifies a damage dealt trigger to the context. The attacker has to be asked for additional power ups to be called.
        Parameters:
        attacker - The player whose attack triggered this event.
        victim - The player who took damage.

      • damageTakenTrigger

        void damageTakenTrigger(Player attacker,
                        Player victim)
        Notifies a damage taken trigger to the context. The victim has to be asked for power ups to be applied to the attacker
        Parameters:
        attacker - The player whose attack triggered this event.
        victim - The player who took damage.
